name: Duel Tanks
description:
Here is our project for the 179th Weekly Game Jam, Duel Tanks!

This submission to the jam really represents an early access of the game. We have much things to add, However, this version has a well-polished gameplay that you can enjoy with your playmate in this Player vs Player tank duel!

Credits

Game Design & Programming: Luis Torrivilla (ChronoRevers)

Sound Design: Taylor Coyne

Art Design: (Cripboyjs) 

The only free asset that has been used in the development of this game is tank´s sprite. It is not the definitive sprite, but it was used to bring this early access of the game. Credits and gratitude to the respective author, Ragewortt

https://ragewortt.itch.io/top-down-sci-fi-tanks
